name: REACH MATURITY
description:
In the future of the wasteland world, the protagonist wakes up from a coma. At this time, an intelligent machine named MMeCHa flies over and tells the protagonist that only by obeying its words can he survive in the apocalypse... 

The protagonist has a mechanical arm that can release magnetic force, which is the core mechanism of the game.. 

The technical work such as code and design is done by me, and the art is done by my friend Liang Jiyue.
